long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to toggle between Dashboard and Admin for SailPoint NERM Lifecycle web UI. It reads the URL and changes the text 'neprofile_dashboard' to 'neprofile_admin' (and vise versa). If it detects a page that is not compatible with either one of these endpoints, then it defaults to the profile's page.
